name: @apitraffic/data-redaction
description: Data redaction library used for both client and server side data redactions.

scripts.pub-patch: npm version patch --force && git push origin main &&  npm publish
scripts.pub-minor: npm version minor --force && git push origin main &&  npm publish
scripts.pub-major: npm version major --force && git push origin main &&  npm publish

author: ApiTraffic.io <sdk@apitraffic.io>
